title: 8.6 Scattering of Light
question: Scattering of light / Penyerakan cahaya 会导致
中午的天空是蓝色的是因为
A: Blue light is scattered the most / Cahaya biru diserak paling banyak
B: Blue light is scattered the least / Cahaya biru diserak paling kurang
C: Red light is scattered the most / Cahaya merah diserak paling banyak
D: Red light is scattered the least / Cahaya merah diserak paling kurang

question: 日落的天空是红色的是因为
A: Blue light is scattered the most / Cahaya biru diserak paling banyak
B: Blue light is scattered the least / Cahaya biru diserak paling kurang
C: Red light is scattered the most / Cahaya merah diserak paling banyak
D: Red light is scattered the least / Cahaya merah diserak paling kurang
